snippet.title: Ultimate Chicken Horse: Transformidable Update
snippet.description:
The Transformidable Update is coming to Ultimate Chicken Horse on March 4th 2019! This new free content will be available on PC/Mac/Linux, Nintendo Switch, XBox One, and PS4. Read about the update below ↓↓↓

With this transformative and formidable update, we are introducing:

MODIFIERS!
Adjust game physics, player characteristics, block and projectile behaviours, and level effects in 20 different ways.

JETPACKS!
You can now find jetpacks in your Party Box. Pick one up to go flying!

RESKINS!
Every character now has an alternate look. Play as Macaw, Red Panda, Axolotl, and more!

For a more complete list of features, check out this link: https://www.cleverendeavourgames.com/transform-update

Want to be in the know?
- Sign up for our newsletter: https://www.cleverendeavourgames.com/signup
- Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/ClevEndeavGames
- Join the official Discord: http://www.discord.gg/uch
